name: Lunar Lance
entries: You conjure moonlight above your head and fire it in a spray of razor-sharp lances. For each creature in 100 feet long and 5 feet wide line make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, you deal {@dice 5d8} radiant damage and the next creature hit takes one less d8 of damage. The spell ends if it reaches 0 d8â€™s of damage or hits its maximum range. If any creature in the line is invisible you ignore the disadvantage imposed by not seeing them and if you hit, their invisibility ends

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each spell slot beyond 3rd.
